# openDirectory(containerIdentifier:)

**Type Method**

Requests an instance of the game-save directory.

## Declaration

```swift
class func openDirectory(containerIdentifier: String? = nil) -> GameSaveSyncedDirectory
```

## Parameters

- **containerIdentifier**: The identifier of the directory to request. If you pass `nil`, this method uses the first container identifier listed in the `com.apple.developer.icloud-container-identifiers` entitlements array.

## Discussion

This method returns immediately, and starts syncing the directory in the background. To wait for syncing to complete, call the [doc://com.apple.GameSave/documentation/GameSave/GameSaveSyncedDirectory/finishSyncing()] method.

## Accessing a directory

- **GameSaveSyncedDirectory.State**: The state of the directory.
- **state**: The state that the game-save directory is in.

items.description: The state that the game-save directory is in.
